bug.author: andrewbeard
bug.summary: [BUG] memtemp plugin always uses c abreviation, even if temperature isn't in celsius
bug.description:
Describe the bug memtemp always displays temperature symbol as c To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Enable the memtemp plugin set the scale to fahrenheit
Expected behavior Temperature would be something like 120.1f Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version 1.2.1
